outputs.output_descr: The project aims at building the capacity of the MIA in fighting and prevention of all forms of crime through provision of specialized tools and capacity development assistance, with particular focus on improving the information analysis function and Small Arms and Light Weapons (SALW) control. The key objectives are to integrate the concept of "Intelligence Led Policing" and the integrated data management system into the work of the Moldovan Police and strengthen the capacity of the MIA in the area of SALW control and management. Institutional and operational capacity of the Ministry and its Information Analysis Service (IAS) will be developed and strengthened through provision of specialized ICT equipment and software, study visits, trainings and provision of expertise for the development and implementation of the institutional and operational development plans.

project_descr: Strengthening institutional capacities of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Republic of Moldova in the field of fighting crime.
project_title: Ministry of Internal Affairs Capacity Development Suppor
